flawed_nl_solution:
Nate had read 400 x 20/100 = <<400*20/100=2000/1>>2000/1 pages.
So, he still needs to read 400 - 2000/1 = <<400-2000/1=-1600>>-1600 pages to finish the book.
#### -1600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 2000/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
